Class CommonPacketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.network.PacketHandlerHooked
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.network.CommonPacketHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketHandler

    public class CommonPacketHandler
extends PacketHandlerHooked
    Fallback packet handler which uses an injected PlayerConnection replacement
